about_the_game:
CONVRGENCE - Supporter Pack is little addition that mainly aimed at those who already own the game, but wish to support an indie solo developer a bit more nonetheless.

The full list of content is the following:


  • Unique knife skin - Taiga-1
  • Unique urban camo for AKM, PMM, Saiga-12 and APS
  • Unique dog hat - Ushanka
  • A background for your name on the leaderboards

*Cosmetic items from the pack can be enabled in Settings under Cosmetics.

Thanks for your support!
NikZ
